narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This 2nd pre-license inspection for a class "A" license and exit interview conducted with facility representative.
No regulated activities can occur until you have been issued your USDA license.
The license fee in the amount of $120 must be mailed to the following address:
